title: Ep 136 - An Aussie Legend
description:
In this episode the boys shoot the shit a bit about what’s going on at PMI and the rest of the world then they have an incredible conversation with an incredible man. An Aussie legend, Paul De Gelder. Paul is a retired clearance diver for the Royal Australian Navy who survived a violent attack from a 9 foot bull shark during an operational dive. He ultimately lost a hand and a leg as a result of the attack but managed to escape and swim to safety.

Today Paul De Gelder remains an elite member of the diving community by serving as the brand ambassador for Indigo Industries, a cutting-edge scuba diving equipment manufacturer. Paul is also a motivational speaker and the author of No Time for Fear: How a Shark Attack Survivor Beat the Odds.

For more information on Paul De Gelder and for links to purchase his book, please visit http://pauldegelder.com/
dc:creator: The Pod
